mapper.insert: insert into tripboard values(0, #{userID}, #{nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), now(), 1, 0)
mapper.select:
select num, userID, nickname, title, content, DATE_FORMAT(wDate, '%Y-%m-%d') 'wDate', uDate, views, likeCount from tripboard
order by num desc
order by likeCount desc
order by views desc
limit #{start}, 15

select num, userID, nickname, title, content, DATE_FORMAT(wDate, '%Y-%m-%d') 'wDate', uDate, views, likeCount from tripboard where 1 = 0
OR title LIKE '%${search}%'
OR content LIKE '%${search}%'
OR nickname LIKE '%${search}%'
OR title LIKE '%${search}%'||content LIKE '%${search}%'
order by num desc limit #{start}, 15

select count(*) from tripboard where 1 = 0
OR title LIKE '%${search}%'
OR content LIKE '%${search}%'
OR nickname LIKE '%${search}%'
OR title LIKE '%${search}%'||content LIKE '%${search}%'
order by num desc limit #{start}, 15
